website_summaries.verdict: These versatile knee sleeves provide support whether you're squatting or running, allowing you to skip from strength training to cardio without missing a beat.
pros: Handcrafted from thick neoprene with reinforced stitching for added durability
Provides excellent stability, compression, and warmth without sacrificing comfort or flexibility
Reduces the risk of injury, promotes circulation, and alleviates aches and pains throughout any workout
cons: High levels of heat retention can cause sweating
Some users found that the logo peeled off rather quickly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had these a month. I’ve used them three times lifting. Unfortunately they tore. BUT the customer service through Nordic Lifting saw this post and personally contacted me to make things right. I am grateful good companies who care about their customers still exist.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY !!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best decisions I've made so far!! I was searching around the for the best price and quality. I looked into SBD and REHBAN. Those are on the pricier side.. looking towards 90-100$!! These nordic sleeves are just as thick and the quality is 100. I was hesitant at first, but once i bought it and used it at the gym, it helped my squatting formation even better. It was a great purchase. I also got it for my friend too! I would highly recc if youre looking for an inexpensive sleeve but still good quality. DEF RECOMMEND !! GOOD QUALITY !!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Phan

customer_reviews.title: Knee sleeve exploded
customer_reviews.text: At first this was a five star product. Kept my knees warm and provided cushioning during heavy lifting. After the fourth time using them one of the sleeve ripped apart during a v-squat. A real shame because I really liked them, but unfortunately one didn't make it through. I bought the XXL size since I have large legs and the reviews looks promising. They had a nice snug fit, not too tight and never rolled off. Maybe an XXXL size should be available for those with larger legs.
customer_reviews.author: Etienne Kenul

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome knee sleeves
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome knee sleeves, I never used to use knee sleeves when working legs, but since I have been recovering from an ACL and MCL injury, I have found these to be incredibly useful. The knee sleeves helo my joints stay warm and they know do not pop and click as much as they used to and I can feel the support in the knee that I injured. Their customer support is incredible, one of the sleeves back stitching began to come undone and they have been very helpful and are sending me a new sleeve to replace the broken one. It was one of the easiest customer service processes I have been through.
customer_reviews.author: A. Alsop

customer_reviews.title: Great for support of arthritic knees.
customer_reviews.text: I have been diagnosed with early arthritis in my knees. I've had issues with knee pain during, and particularly after exercise. These knee pads support my patella well, and supply warmth and compression all over my knees, allowing me to exercise without pain or swelling. I have gotten my squat weights up, not because the sleeves assist in the lift, but because I don't fear knee pain. I can also play pickleball with no fear of soreness after either.
customer_reviews.author: jml

customer_reviews.title: Avoid these knee sleeves. Bad Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Bad quality and non-existent customer service. I used these sleeves for 1 month, 3-4x/week until they failed. I did typical Oly and Power style lifts with them. They were not used for CrossFit style WODs. Both sleeves ripped in the exact same spot, along the white line going up the side. To make matters more annoying, I reached out to Nordic’s email to request a warranty replacement. I received no response to date. I actually really liked them while they worked, and thought the support and flexibility was great. Pretty much wasted $40+ for 1 month of lifting sleeves. Thanks Nordic Lifting.
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: So much support
customer_reviews.text: I've had issues with my knees for a while- with any activity that bears weight on them, but I didn't want that to get in the way of my gains, so I grabbed these. i got size medium and they were super tight. I'd never be able to get them over a pair of leggings, so i'll just have to wear shorts. I did barbell back squats, split squats and lunges and my knees have never felt better. How was I doing life w/o these??
customer_reviews.author: Sheenbean

customer_reviews.title: For extra knee support without the bulk
customer_reviews.text: I use these for lifting weights and on days that my one bad knee could use more support. Great flexibility but support with it. Use it during squats or leg press days. They slide up and down fairly easy. I just slide them down after each set then back up for the next one. Make sure you measure your knee as they say and opt for the smaller one if you are borderline on the size. Definitely recommend for lifters or people with bad knees that want good support. Not recommended for all day wear but possible. Had these for 6 months and have held up to periodic lifting and 6 to 8 hour wear time at work occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and supportive, well built.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and supportive: Make certain you properly measure your knees before ordering. I am 59 years young and after having right knee injuries years ago , I now have Osteo arthritis in right knee. I love skiing fast but needed more support so I tried these out. With a combo of working out and wearing these 7mm thick sleeves , I can ski with relative confidence . I avoid the moguls and trees . I also find them comfotable enough for everyday wear to prevent further injury to knees. I did not give the knee sleeves a five because nothing can replace the strenght of a healthy knee. Do not wash in hot water and put in dryer
customer_reviews.author: JerryLandi

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but tight
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time buying something like this, so I’m not sure if I got the correct size. I used the size chart which lead me to get the large, but they are very tight around my thighs and calves. I bought these knee sleeves to help support my knees while lifting heavy fire hose at work, and they work great. My knees feel so much better at the end of the work-day. You see, I test fire hose almost everyday, and each 100 foot roll of Large Diameter Hose weighs about 100lbs. Constant walking on hard pavement and constant lifting of fire hose is rough on the knees.
customer_reviews.author: The Great Flik

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Product!
customer_reviews.text: These are very well made, great quality knee sleeves. My trainer recommended I use these during squats and deadlifts. They have definitely helped me get lower in my squats and, therefore, I have been able to squat with heavier weights. I use them sometimes when deadlifting. However, sometimes they seem to get in my way so I don't always wear them. My knees are 13" and I couldn't decide whether I should go with the Small or Medium. I choose the small and I'm glad I did as someone mentioned they did stretch a bit. They are very snug fitting and they fit perfectly. I would definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Momof Twins

customer_reviews.title: Super bad ass man
customer_reviews.text: Super bad ass man! Been squating and such for years now and I was advised by my bud to get knee sleeves. My knees still pop buuut it doesn’t hurt during or after. My knees are nice and toasty and ready to bend. Feeling good on the gains train. I got the 7mm so I only use them purely for lifts where I take my time. Squats, DL, overhead press, etc. just where the bending in the knees needs help. I don’t wear them for the rest of the workout. I might consider a 5mm for box jumps, rowing, or KB swing. The 7mm are way too thick to move like that.
customer_reviews.author: Sherqd

customer_reviews.title: Great for heavy squats
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for sleeves for heavy lifting (squats, leg press, a Buick, etc.), these are for you. Great support and stability and keep knees warm. I'm doing heavy A2G squats, and these things give me complete confidence that my joints are protected so I can focus on the lift not my knees. One thing to keep in mind, they run small, so order one size larger than you think, and you'll be happy. I had to return the first pair I ordered to get the next size up.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Buy the right size!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big guy, 276lbs, who squats heavy weights- let’s just say the bar bows - these bad boys hold their own! I got the largest size they had. I sweat and they get sticky due to their neoprene type material. I have to wait until I’m not super sweaty to peel them off BUT they provide excellent support. I even injured my knee three weeks ago and used them as a “support brace” while the sprain healed. The implication is that I wore them all day while at work and they were comfortable under my slacks.
customer_reviews.author: Jeramie

customer_reviews.title: Did squats as soon as I got them and they ...
customer_reviews.text: Did squats as soon as I got them and they helped stabilize the knees and eliminate the pain I was getting doing squats and going down the stairs as well. I was getting fearful of the pain in that first set and these definitely helped and gave me confidence to get the full range of motion. Ordered a set for a high school buddy who is "getting up in age" (joke in case he sees this) and has too many miles on the basketball court on his knees; hope he gets a few more years with these.
customer_reviews.author: Leo de Leon

customer_reviews.title: Great product, worth the investment.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. My knees always hurt during any leg workout. So I bought these. They go on a little tight, but that doesn't bother me. Yes the back of your knees will sweat, but that helps them slide off. Trust me on this one. Great support. They even feel like they add a little extra spring to my leg lifts, might be just me, but I greatly appreciate the feel of extra help on my lifts. Especially from my weakest joint. Great buy, I do highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Big disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I used these twice and they ripped along the seam. In the photo the knee sleeve is turned inside out to give a better view of the area of failure. I would not recommend this style (pull over leg) I would buy the style that wraps around legs/knees. I give one star because of the quality given the cost to buy.
customer_reviews.author: eric quigley

customer_reviews.title: 4 months use. Already ripping apart
customer_reviews.text: I used the sleeves about 2 times a week, sometimes less, for about 4 months. Used the sleeves for primarily squatting and then would take them off after. Upsetting that they’ve already ripped on me. I feel like i don’t even use them enough that it would have that much wear on it to rip. Most likely wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Roland

customer_reviews.title: If your knees hurt, BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I am 29 and hit the gym a lot and often times when i squat above 315 i always get achy knees. I love these sleeves for the price. There are so many sleeves for much much higher price and i have used them but these are perfect. Tight, comfy and they WORK! Get your legs warmed up before lifting and throw these on for the entire leg workout and your pain will go away. Proper form helps and so do these.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Darling

customer_reviews.title: The Best Knee Sleeves
customer_reviews.text: I've been lifting for over 40 years and still squat heavy. I've always wrap my knees even for warm up squats. Now with these sleeves I can do warm up weight and moderate heavy weight with sleeves only. I still use knee wraps over these sleeves when I go heavy. But for all other leg presses, hacks etc. these are the best. All my work out rats now own them. But, it's so important you make sure you get the right size. Use the measure chart they provide.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase! Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Just received my Nordic lifting sleeves; they were neatly packed and they arrived on time. The Nordic lifting sleeves are made from quality materials and the seams are strong and in tact. During my first use: deadlift (425 lbs), leg press (700 lbs), they provided quality compression with no deformities. I purchased the large; I measured my knee area (per instructions) and came to 16 inches; I am 5’10”, 207 lbs. Thank you Nordic for a great product! Will be buying a pair for my wife; I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Steven R

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: My knee measures 13 inches, which is right between the small and medium sizes. Since I wanted good compression I decided to go down and order the small. Even being a smaller size, they don't offer very good compression and bunch up badly during squats. They do keep my knees warm during my workout which helps, but ultimately wasn't what I was looking for. Sometimes I still prefer the dollar store knee sleeves I was using prior to these, which is pretty bad considering these were literally 40 times the price of those. Next time there's a deal on these I'm going to get the XS. Hopefully that'll work out better.
customer_reviews.author: iWumbo

customer_reviews.title: I really like these knee sleeves and they make a big difference ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like these knee sleeves and they make a big difference in my comfort during lower body exercises (bad knees)- I will, though, watch closely for their ability to hold up. My one concern is that after measuring properly for correct size, I popped a few seams recently during an aggressive squat set... so far more have not broken, so hopefully they continue to hold up over time. Truly though, very comfortable, offer great compression on the knees to help support during lower body lifting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they have been perfect. I use them on my leg days
customer_reviews.text: When I tried these on they weren't very snug. I measured at 13.5 which put me into the medium fit. I was nervous that they wouldn't provide sufficient support. Especially since I needed it after a partial tear of my mcl. To my surprise, they have been perfect. I use them on my leg days. My knees feel warm & secure. The sleeves provide enough support without cutting off circulation in my legs. I haven't had any tweeks of pain (happened prior to wearing sleeves). Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Skyy

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch Quality and Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Very, very good construction and solid! I got the large and am 210lbs, 6'3". I use them when squatting and doing olympic lifts. VERY pleased with them and the fact I didn't spend big money for the brand you see all the sponsored athletes wearing. These are perfect for the average athlete killin' every day in the gym or garage.
customer_reviews.author: GarageBoxNick

customer_reviews.title: I can now go to parallel or slightly below on barbell squats!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these knee sleeves for only a week now, and they are making a big difference in my barbell squats. Prior to using these knee sleeves, going to parallel was nearly impossible due to knee problems that I have from prior injury. With the Nordic Lifting knee sleeves, I have been able to go to parallel and even slightly below during barbell squats, making the exercise more effective. They are very well made and fit comfortably. I am very happy with these knee sleeves and would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Fuhs

customer_reviews.title: Improved Workouts First Time Wearing
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these to help with my lifting. I'm 6'4" and weight about 300lbs. I do more strongman workouts and these have dramatically helped my knees with squats and other lifts that can put a lot of strain on my knees. Would highly recommend buying these. The only thing is that neoprene can get really smelly so you need to make sure you turn them inside out and let them air properly because they can get to smelling awful if you don't!
customer_reviews.author: Adam S.

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: had these for about 2 or 3 years now. They are great sleeves for the money. They aren't quite Strong Sleeve quality, but for the average lifter they do what they are designed to do - provide warmth to the knee joint, and provide just a minimal amount of support when squatting. I bought these for power lifting, but only use them in training. Pro note - They work great as elbow sleeves as well ;)
customer_reviews.author: M. disalvatore

customer_reviews.title: Good value, great if you are on a budget.
customer_reviews.text: They give the support you need and were easy to put on compared to others I've used. They aren't overly warm and are a little thinner than the more expansive pairs, but for the price, you can't beat it. They lasted almost a year for a 300-pound man, so the quality is very good even if they don't feel quite as nice as more expensive ones. Great if you are on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Moniodis

customer_reviews.title: Working out is fun again
customer_reviews.text: Nordic lifting knee sleeves, what more can I say. This is it, the right product that does the job. I suffer from osteoarthritis, which is very painful. Sometimes preventing me from working out to the fullest. This product has eliminated any undo stress on the joints, allowing more flexibility. Deeper squats, I even enjoy long bicycle rides without any residual pain afterwards. I highly recommend this product, stand behind it and hope as we all age that this product will grow with me.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Stefan

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a knee sleeve that would be supportive, but still allow full range of motion. This product is right on the money! I use them during squats, deadlifts, cleans and snatches. The level of compression is perfect. Really helps me with my aching knees. One thing I wish is that the material was a bit more breathable, but I suppose that would be difficult to achieve if support/compression is the goal. I followed the sizing chart and had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: A company that stands behind their products
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these knee sleeves twice a week for the last nine months and they have performed great. Unfortunately, last week I noticed that the knee sleeve was coming apart at the seam. I emailed the company, on a Sunday, to find out if they would honor their one year warranty and to my surprise they replied back that same day and today, less than a week later, I received my replacement knee sleeves. If you are looking for an excellent product and amazing customer service you will want to go with Nordic Lifting.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend these for heavy Oly Lifts
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Awesome Awesome. I recently had some discomfort in my knee from doing some heavy cleans and knew at that point I had to get some knee sleeves. After giving my body rest when it came time to step up to the bar again I noticed a significant difference in support and stabilization when doing cleans. I went on to perform several pistol squats and I didn't even know I could do pistol squats! I only tried the pistol squats without a target because I was confident and knew I had good support with these sleeves. My knee measured to be 13.5 I got a small for tight compression, exactly what I wanted! Super happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JPLFC2002

customer_reviews.title: Don't Purchase from Amazon vendor. Buy directly from Nordic...Mine broke in 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed the knee sleeves until they broke. They took a lot of stress off my knees and helped me recover from a pulled hamstring. The problem is that I tore both of them within about 3 months of use. I bought mine on Amazon from Amazon's LLC. I tried making a warranty claim directly with Nordic, but they diverted me to Amazon LLC, which then sent me back to Nordic. I'm not sure who's the responsibility it is, but either way, it definitely made for bad customer experience. I'll be buying my next pair of knee sleeves elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Terence Hirsch

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Recommended I get one size smaller than measurements. Great recommendation. Amazing support. Have slightly torn meniscus and both knees but have been able to substantially increase leg workouts. Also use them while playing racquetball and have amazing support for more than just lifting weights. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: works even with no metal in it.
customer_reviews.text: works well, it's funny how this little thing which has no metal in it works.Sure helps me with my knee pain. I'm on my feet all day & i twisted my knee a few weeks ago. Wearing this knee sleeves, i don't even notice the pain. At the end of the day when wearing the knee sleeves no pain in the knee, even in the gym with squats........no knee pain.......I hope they last, seem durable enough. but i would buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: zefo

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Lasted only 6 months. Material wripped away from back seam. Used for squats and leg press twice per week. Stable, supportive and fit well - but only one star due to durability. Two expensive to not last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Suppirt
customer_reviews.text: I needed something for my knee that was popping a bit during workouts and yoga. I was also experiencing some pain on days when I overworked the knee. This sleeve really helped provide the support and comfort I needed. It can be a bit tricky to pull on over leggings but once on it is very comfortable. My fitness coached recommended this one and I do too.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good product. They provide a decent amount of support but they tend to start slipping or bunching up after sets. A size up would be too big and a size down would be way too snug. It does the job though. It gives me the support I need during sets when it's important. Just a pain to need to adjust often
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good...
customer_reviews.text: Never had the need for knee sleeves when I was younger, but I guess everything changes once you're past certain age. These keep your knees really warm, exactly what they were made for. From what I can see really well made but let me get some more time in and you'll get a more detailed review. But for now loving them. **Update 09/20/20** Both of them broke in seems, was fun while it lasted!
customer_reviews.author: R. Maduro

customer_reviews.title: Love 'em
customer_reviews.text: Got them on Monday just in time for leg day. They fit great, didn't have to upsize or downsize, and are just the right amount of compression. No problems with the seam in the back. I wish I would have ordered them a looong time ago. I felt so much better doing squats and even increased my lbs. They are very sweaty though. I think it's worth it for that nice warm feeling around your knee and the support they provide. I haven't washed them yet but will update if there are any problems. Update: It's been about 3 weeks or so and they are still holding up great even after a couple of washes.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great Sleeves, Ripped
customer_reviews.text: These sleeves were a great starter pair for me. I used them for squatting, lunges, squat cleans, etc. I washed them about twice a month, never put them in the dryer. I wore them probably no more than 30 times, and both sleeves ended up ripping. Again great pair, but not a good quality for Crossfit workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Nick S.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent for some Knee sleeves / Needs to be stretched out / Odd smell
customer_reviews.text: it's pretty decent. It has an odd smell when you first open it, I was not a fan of the smell and It was really really hard to get on because It was super tight at first and I thought maybe I had gotten the wrong size even though I went based off of the correct measurements but I decided to hold off and I wore it for a couple of times for Leg day and now it fits perfectly. It just needed to be stretched. It has a bit of a cushion to it. It also makes your knees super sweaty, if you're into that.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Beckett

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for. Stitching gone after 10 months.
customer_reviews.text: I engage in the sport of powerlifting. I go through phases where I squat 3 to 4 times a week and phases where I squat once every 10 days. I used these knee sleeves pretty much only during my heavier working sets, and in about 10 months the stitching at the seems on both of them are 80% undone, to the point where they're currently useless. They served me well for 10 months. Had good range of motion, enough support and tightness. But I'll be investing in something a little sturdier this time around.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: I definitely recommend this product for power lifting!
customer_reviews.text: These knee sleeves are great, my only advise is expect to feel a difference from traditional knee wraps. Other that that, I’m 42 years old and still powerlifting. Feel great support whether it’s 610lbs on hack squats or 500 pounds on free squat. I definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for powerlifting
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use for powerlifting. I normally use Titan Yellow Jacket knee sleeves, but wanted to try something new. I was a little disappointed in the level of stiffness and support these have. Just a little too flexible and not enough support for powerlifting, although they did keep my knees nice and warm. They would be good for CrossFit workouts where you switch from powerlifting to cardio and back in the same workout, but for straight powerlifting I don’t recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: truble135

customer_reviews.title: Total Life Saver!!!
customer_reviews.text: These sleeves saved my life. I couldn’t be happier! I was not able to do my squats, lunges or even cycle without knee pain. From the minute I put these sleeves on, I am now able to do many squats and lunges. Working out is a very important part of my life. Thanks NORDIC for make my workouts possible and with absolutely NO PAIN!!! Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: brittany oconnell

customer_reviews.title: Good for a month then stretch out way to much.
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed in how easily these knee braces stretch out. I started wearing them after i tore my ACL for support when i squat. At first the knee brace was great. After using them for about a month they stretched out so much at the quad that i can fit 2 fingers in the brace while wearing them. My legs have actually grew an inch so i don’t get why they would be so loose. I got the correct size too. Idk if i got a defected pair or if there sizing chart is wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Harris

customer_reviews.title: Save your knees; buy these!
customer_reviews.text: The sleeves worked as designed. Kept my knees warm and stable. I just started back using free weights for squats. My only complaint/wish is that there was a larger size. I’ve always had large knees and calves. Not fat. Just large. The lower band around my calf is a little snug. Leaves a distinct ring. But i can deal with it for the time i am doing squats. it isn’t so much painful as uncomfortable at first.
customer_reviews.author: M. Scott

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: I’m tall and squatting is not a pleasant but necessary experience. I got these and wow so much better on my knees it seems to stabilize them better. And allows me to do more weight without pain. These are the same quality but lower cost than a friends. Buy and you won’t be upset.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Halstead

customer_reviews.title: I didn't think these would really help me as much as they did.
customer_reviews.text: They work as intended. They keep the knees warm during the workout. I had minor knee pain during and following leg days. Grabbed a pair of these and now I don't have any problems during or after the workout. Down sides if you care about it is you sweat a lot while they are on and they don't breath. They build that sweat up and they do have a pretty strong funk to them after words. I just let them air out in a low traffic are and all was well.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Klingensmith

customer_reviews.title: Great knee supports - buy them now for Crossfit training
customer_reviews.text: So glad I got these!!! Never had any real knee probs, but I’m 45 and going pretty hard at CrossFit so I figured an ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure, right? Totally right! These thing are great! They just make your knees feel snug and stable - especially on oly lifts. Btw, my knees measure 16” and pretty muscular, and the large fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gillis

customer_reviews.title: One of my friends keeps asking to borrow these on leg day
customer_reviews.text: I love these knee sleeves. The support and comfort I get from a thicker, better quality sleeve like these is so much better than what you can find at your local big box store. I work in a gym and one of my buddies is constantly asking to borrow them because he likes them more than his knee wraps. They don't ride or bunch like other sleeves. They're just good knee sleeves.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Robe

customer_reviews.title: Good shit.
customer_reviews.text: Had these over a year and they still feel like new even after all the olly lifting and squatting sessions. Make sure you wash them because they smell like ass once you leave them in your gym bag for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: The best knee pads!!!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try the Nordic knee sleeve since so many reviews were rated at a five star, I am so glad I did, just received them today tried them on on and WoW! you can feel the support around the knees, I will try them out while exercising on Saturday, I have walked around the house with them on they are so supportive and have the knees pain free, I feel like I can sleep with them on 😊 Believe me the knee pads are worth every penny spent. Nordic you have won a new customer.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd gotten them sooner
customer_reviews.text: I'm 46 and have never used any type of accessory for lifting. I've been feeling my knees off-and-on for years, but recently thought I'd give sleeves a try to aid in the warm-up process. These are a perfect fit: snug without feeling like they're going to cut off my circulation. Has really helped to get the knees warmed up without having to do set after set of increasing load to "get the blood flowing".
customer_reviews.author: Blake J.

customer_reviews.title: Failed within one month
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of knee sleeves. I love that they're definitely a confidence booster and do a good job of keeping your knees warm while lifting. Unfortunately, the neoprene on the inside has already torn within one month of 2x a week squat workouts. 2/5 stars for the lack of durability. Update! Upon seeing my review, Nordic Lifting promptly reached out to me and sent a replacement set of knee sleeves to replace the defective one I had originally received. Would highly recommend this company for their prompt customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Everett Brown

customer_reviews.title: Smelly
customer_reviews.text: It had a very bad smell that made me return it. Actually it was in my room for a night and I had to wake up and move it out of my room because of the smell. I tried them on though and the measurements are accurate and seemed to have a good support.
customer_reviews.author: Abteenz

customer_reviews.title: I get a smooth drop and a nice bounce on the way down
customer_reviews.text: First knee sleeve's i've used, and this review is simply based on using them once. It does what it's suppose to, makes me squat more confidently and safer. I get a smooth drop and a nice bounce on the way down, weird to explain but if you squat you can imagine what im trying to say. No knee pain or irritation from the squats so far, just my legs (sore). I would give it a 5 but it's too soon, will have to wait and see after months of using it, to see how durable it is.
customer_reviews.author: Farious

customer_reviews.title: Did wonders for leg-day.
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feel high quality. Very fast processing and shipping. Great first impression for Nordic Lifting. Tried the knee sleeves on this morning for squats & deadlifts. No more knee bruising! The pressure must have done something for blood flow because my knees no longer feel the pressure under squats, and I was able to finish all my sets without any visible bruising. Yes, I have weird knees, they bruise easily when I go low on squats. On deadlifts, these help guard against the bar scrapping on knees if my form happen to get out of control. These feel essential for squats and deadlifts now. Glad I got them.
customer_reviews.author: T. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Way too tight!
customer_reviews.text: These are way too tight on me. I measured as per the guidelines, but my calves and quads feel like the circulation is being cut off. My range of motion in these are severly hampered, which negatively effects my workouts. Im going to try and contact the company about a larger size, if not itll be a straight return.
customer_reviews.author: charles

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind, MEASURE according to the chart. It will come snug. I got the XL and it is a dash tight but I need them to be that way. That's why it does restrict motion just a bit but for squats and even running they do the job. They seem very durable as well.
customer_reviews.author: MM88

customer_reviews.title: Good support, but will it last??
customer_reviews.text: I got a size Medium because I wanted a tighter fit to really give me support when I do heavier squats and lunges. This definitely compresses! I probably would have been good with a large too, as the medium is nearly too tight. But I’d rather it be tight than loose and bunch up. The only crappy thing about this is the seams are already unraveling!!! I’ve only worn them maybe 4-5x and noticed the seams were coming undone. NOT COOL. Especially for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Zaneta

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: I would normally give something like this at 5 but the initial break-in almost made me give up on them they felt bulky and uncomfortable now after some use they are super comfortable and give plenty of support all in all I would recommend to buy them just be prepared to break them in might not even hurt to wear them for a day walking around what not
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Awesome support.
customer_reviews.text: Package - good. Material - good. The only thing not good are my legs. I think I may have ordered a size bigger than my knees/legs because the sleeves tend to slide down. That does give me the motivation to work the legs more to fill the sleeves up.
customer_reviews.author: ingelheim eribal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my heavy squats!
customer_reviews.text: I am 25 years old 200lbs and my squat is currently at 585lbs. I am very impressed with these knee sleeves and I would highly recommend them to anyone who is in the market for a quality pair of sleeves! I have purchased these for a few of my personal training clients as well and they are also very happy with them. I ordered a couple of sizes smaller than what is recommended for a tighter fit. I have 26" legs and I went with size Medium. I am very impressed with this product!
customer_reviews.author: BMo

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: These were great at first and having bought them in February and I don’t even use them every time I lift, I’m super disappointed that they’re already separating at the seams. They had such good reviews but they’re not durable. I only olympic lift in them also, not Crossfit or anything.
customer_reviews.author: KRISTOPHER RICHARD KRYSA

customer_reviews.title: A great knee-sleeve for anyone
customer_reviews.text: Immediately impressed with the feel and function of these sleeves. One cosmetic issue is that the "nordic lifting" decal tears/peels off really easily, but the rest of the sleeve is very solidly constructed. See the attached photo. I would recommend these sleeves to anyone who does any volume of squatting, lunging, or leg pressing, or any movement that produces force on the knee; they keep the joint warm, reducing risk of injury, and provide (if you order the right fit) enough compression to aid performance. If these wear out, I'll be sure to buy another pair!
customer_reviews.author: A. Boyum

customer_reviews.title: Measure twice!
customer_reviews.text: Measured as indicated, went a size larger since I have runners calves...they fit, but are quite tight around the openings, like they were stitched up too tight, everywhere else the fit is fine ...I'm going to just deal with it vs replacement...and the have a petrol type smell, been about 2weeks and it's still present... material is very thick, which is great for lunges!...great that they come in a pair vs some that are the same price for one. Overall definitely worth the purchase...just make sure you measure and get the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Darcilla/PeacocksandPurls

customer_reviews.title: Will add 200 lbs to your squat on day 1
customer_reviews.text: But seriously. Knee sleeves are great for squatting heavy, and these do the job just fine. I followed the guidelines for fitting, and the size was perfect for me as far as snugness and ability to put them on without a full team kneewrap style. My only complaint is that I wish they were about an inch or two longer. I am 5'7" and normally proportioned. They bunch up a bit after each set and have to be stretched back out. Otherwise, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Kapp

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I looked at knee sleeves/wraps in my local sports store. They were 30-40 for ONE sleeve. You can get a pair of these for the price of ONE of those. Immediate knee joint pain relief when squatting both high or low bar, could add another 15lbs on my working sets easily. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Super support, no problems! Get em!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these knee sleeves! I've used these sleeves for 2 yrs....yes, 2 yrs. No problems, no rips, just super support! I use them twice a week during leg days. They get put through a lot! These make a difference! I'm back to get another pair because..., well it's been 2 yrs of rigorous use. I will continue to stick with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.

customer_reviews.title: Good Support - No Pain
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing negative to say about these. I am older, so I bought these hoping my knee(s) would stop hurting during squats. I was correct. They support my knees very well. These were recommended to me by a soldier at the gym. It was a good recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: BeamMeUpScotty

customer_reviews.title: Awkward fit
customer_reviews.text: For me the product seems to be well made, but they don't fit me correctly. I don't know if this is their construction or the sizing. I followed the guidelines for the sizing/measuring and ordered a Medium, but maybe I was supposed to be a small. I'm pretty disappointed to be out of pocket the money for these and I can't utilize them in my workouts. They look as advertised, but the fit is not great from my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Hello it's Jasper

customer_reviews.title: They work really well for me.
customer_reviews.text: Started having knee discomfort during work outs and tried copper fit sleeves which were trash. These were recommended by my trainer and I have noted a difference. They are snug and dont slip like others I've tried. I like them and would recommend them if your in the market for something like them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable sleeves. Great protection for my damaged knees (Meniscus ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sleeves, best I have ever had so far. I've only used them twice but the protection is awesome. I have meniscus tear on both knees and damage on both patellar tendons so the pain is constant. Most importantly, it reduces the knee pain significantly. I'm very happy with these sleeves
customer_reviews.author: Retro

customer_reviews.title: They work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Love the sleeves. Some of my real lifting buddies told me to order knee sleeves for leg day to help with knee pains. I've only used them once so far. They helped with pain a lot. The size is comfortable and I order going by the chart. I'm not a professional knee sleeve wearing, but I believe this will help me get those gains. Now I need some elbow sleeves. O, and they check with you via email pre and post delivery for satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Bamaboy23

customer_reviews.title: Seems high quality
customer_reviews.text: A little on the pricey side IMO, but they seem high quality and worth it. I have a 15" knee as measured in the graphic, and I ordered a medium for compression. I guess if you were using them for wrestling or something, you may want to order the size recommended, but I use them for compression and knee stabilization when squatting, and the medium works very well for that. No more crunchy clicking in my knee as I go through full ROM. I've only used them twice, so we'll see how they hold up. But they seem well-fabricated; no loose threads or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Asher Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Well-made product, an essential for a heavy squat workout
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to see how they helped my back squat, and I was very happy with how they fit and felt throughout my workout (I kept them on for the duration of my squat and deadlift workout). The combination of compression and warmth around my knees seems to help the joints perform during my workout and recover quicker. I never get knee pain with my heavy leg workouts but I wanted to see how these felt anyways and I am definitely going to keep wearing them for leg workouts. These sleeves seem very well made, though I haven't owned them long enough to truly test thier durability.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Must have on leg day...
customer_reviews.text: Had my first leg workout with these. Wow! I had some pain in both knees for a few weeks. I thought finally all the years of going heavy is catching up with me. I put these on and i was able to do squats, leg press and leg extensions. I didnt want to overdue it since my knees arent 100% yet but I got in an awesome workout! Im never doing legs without these again.
customer_reviews.author: socalmusclejock

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic fit!
customer_reviews.text: No more squeaky knees for my squats. My knees would squeak before I started using these thick cushioned knee sleeves. I used to wear those thin knee wraps from Ace, which was okay in the beginning because the weights were rather light. Now that I'm steadily loading up in weight, safety and posture becomes more important. A good set of knee support and lifting belt is a most for any serious barbell training. I ordered a medium and it fits very snugly but not uncomfortable and it looks rad! Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Guy2

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! My knees are horrible after a few surgeries and I needed good support for weightlifting and these provide just that. I have small legs and I picked a small and they fit, but could've gone down to an Xsmall just like the seller says if you want them tighter. May buy another pair just to have around. They do get sweaty and hot, but I love the fact that you can wash them!"
customer_reviews.author: Maria Sherer

customer_reviews.title: For powerlifting, Large size for 16.5” diameter @ knee
customer_reviews.text: Needed for Barbell Squats. My knee measures 16.5 inches around, measured mid-patella. For Power Lifting and my knee size, the large pair are a really good fit. Right amount of compression. No bunching of material behind the knee. Great quality... all the way down to the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Rocco Hazzard

customer_reviews.title: Knee sleeves
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for over a year now and I'm unhappy with them. They really hurt behind my knee after I wear them for a while. They bunch up a lot too. I've washed them several times and they smell horrible. They've smelled since I first took them out of the package. I haven't had any tears of the seams though.
customer_reviews.author: albert

customer_reviews.title: Helped my husband knees..
customer_reviews.text: My husband has bad knees. So when he’s out doing squats with a bunch of weight they start to bug him. He uses these every single time now. I don’t see him having to adjust them too much but he has a few times. They don’t slip nearly as much as I thought they would. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Brina

customer_reviews.title: Good solid product.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely adds support/pressure to the knee area, probably should have when a size lower if using specifically for lifting but superb for jogging/crossfit. A little pinchie at the back of leg but that just comes down to adjustments. Just got'em so we'll see on longevity
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just do it
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these two and a half years ago and wish I had bought them sooner. These keep your legs and knees feeling fresh throughout your workout. I don’t do leg day without them. Only recently have I begun to notice any deterioration, which is why I bought a second pair without hesitation. My only complaint would be that they hold in the stank, so you have to wash them frequently. Don’t let that stop you though. Buy them and experience the magic.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: I took a good year off to recover and stick to bodyweight routines
customer_reviews.text: After hurting my knees from going too hard on kettlebell training, I took a good year off to recover and stick to bodyweight routines, yoga, etc. When I came back to kettlebell training, I was worried I was going to re-injure myself. I felt much more confident with front squat and racked lunge motions while using these, and I was able to move up to heavier weights for the first time in a while. Excellent quality, worth checking out.
customer_reviews.author: CDKD

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Love these sleeves. I have some knee problems from years of volleyball that affected my weight lifting, but these have really made a difference across the board. I don't feel my knees pop and they don't ache nearly as much from heavier weights. Really glad I gave these a shot! Personally, I got my exact size. I was right between a small and a medium and I originally got a small (per the reviews on here), only to realize they were uncomfortably tight as far my preference. I reordered a medium instead and I am incredibly happy I chose to size up.
customer_reviews.author: AJohnson

customer_reviews.title: I like them. The compression is solid and I think ...
customer_reviews.text: These knee sleeves add a little extra stability and knee protection on squat and other leg movements. Helps keep them warm so you stay ready whenever to squat. I had some knee pain that these helped to correct and prevent in the future just with the extra stability. They seemed to have worked well for me. I like them. The compression is solid and I think also helps the knee recovery. No issues when wearing them, and the sizing chart for me was accurate. Comfortable and stylish enough :)
customer_reviews.author: Andrew K

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: "I have had a bad knee for minimum of 5 years. Am trying all I can before surgery and this knee sleeve truly helps aleve the pain while I'm up and moving. I do have to remove it occasionally as it cuts into my calf but I am happy not having so much pail. I am not a weight lifter. I am 72 years old and appreciate all the help I can get."
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Start here
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and nicely packaged, I use them for Crossfit. I was skeptical because of the price, but after reading other reviews decided to give them a shot. I used them right of the package the day I got them, I measured for a large and ordered a medium per others recommendations. They feel and fit great and most importantly they don't roll down like my Rehbands. Week later I have hit my PR on deadlift. The screen print has come off on the front, but I did not care. For the price and comfort this was a great buy and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Ski219

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this item for 2 weeks now and I honestly don’t know how I worked out without this item before. It is definitely a game changer! It gives my knees the support I needed. The quality is great and it fit perfect. I got a size S. Super easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I got them because I developed a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I got them because I developed a little knee pain from the bottom of deep front squats. These helped quite a bit and are 5/8's the price of the Rehbrand sleeves, and from reading all the reviews, just as good quality. They did the job and I'm very happy with them. Just be sure to wash them seperately from your clothes, because the material does kinda stink and it will transfer to your clothing. I would imagine the smell will begin to go away over time though, and will update this if/when it does or does not.
customer_reviews.author: That guy

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The first pair I bought tore at the seams, but I did get one size too small. That was the recommendation by seller if you want a tighter fit. I woukd recommend you buy within your size range. Other than that they work well and I like them
customer_reviews.author: ricky

customer_reviews.title: Great Knee Sleeves
customer_reviews.text: These neoprene knee sleeves work great, and fit exactly as described when using the sizing guide. They provide a great combination of support and heat retention within the joint, making my lifts almost painless. These are probably the best knee sleeves I've ever used, going all the way back to the early 1980s when I was an Olympic level athlete.
customer_reviews.author: AMGP

customer_reviews.title: GOOD FIT. BUT TEARS EASILY.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED THESE KNEE SLEEVES, KEPT MY KNEES WARM AND STURDY. BUT WHAT I DIDN'T LIKE IS THAT THEY TORE AT THE SEAMS VERY EASY. IF THERE IS A PROPER WAY PUTTING THEM ON I WOULD LOVE TO KNOW. I REACHED OUT TO THE COMPANY AND I' SURE THEY'LL MAKE IT RIGHT. BUT OVER ALL AWESOME PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: cary brown III

customer_reviews.title: I always suspected people were wearing them because they thought it made them look cool. Nordic sleeves help with knee pain
customer_reviews.text: These are not just for show. They work as advertised! I always suspected people were wearing them because they thought it made them look cool. Nordic sleeves help with knee pain. You will feel like a better squatter as soon as you squat with these on. It is obvious immediately that Nordic sleeves are very high quality. I was considering buying the more advertised brand until I found out the price was for one sleeve. There is no way the popular brand is worth twice as much as these. The customer service follow up to check on my satisfaction with my purchase was impressive.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Work well but smell strong
customer_reviews.text: They work really well. I used them a few times now during crossfit. My only complaint is they smell super strong like chemical. I have washed them 4 times and they still are crazy strong. Hoping it goes away soon or I may return.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: HOLD THEIR SHAPE, don't bunch up, comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Use them in Jujitsu, for the last 12 years. Machine or hand washable. They hold their shape, are easy to turn inside out and take off and are even stylish, although that wasn't a concern. Liked them enough to get a set for a friend. UPDATE: recently bought 5 more pairs as gifts for different nurses/assistants I happened to meet. Seems everyone I meet needs something for their feet, back or knees. CON: found someone for whom largest size was too small. But perhaps they will add an even larger one later on. (I think when I bought my first pair, it was only medium and large.)
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Gould

product_meta.title: Knee Sleeves (1 Pair) Support & Compression for Weightlifting, Powerlifting & Cross Training - 7mm Neoprene Sleeve for the Best Squats - Both Women & Men - by Nordic Lifting
product_meta.description:
KNEE SLEEVES (1 PAIR) DESIGNED TO INCREASE YOUR PERFORMANCE AND PREVENT PAINFUL INJURY 


Nordic Lifting Offers Premium Accessories for Weightlifting Workouts
- Carefully Crafted With Premium Quality 7mm Neoprene and Reinforced Stitching 
- Ergonomic Sleeve Design for Extra Comfort and the Perfect Fit 


SIZING - please see Sizing Chart in the listing images above
Straighten your leg and measure the circumference of your knee (mid patella). Use a flexible type tape measure. 
➤ XS: under 11.8" 
➤ S: 11.8" - 13" 
➤ M: 13" - 14.2" 
➤ L: 14.2" - 15.7" 
➤ XL: 15.7" - 17" 
➤ XXL: 17" - 18.3" 


Who can benefit from using Knee Sleeves?
Beginners as well as seasoned fitness individuals - a "Must Have" for Squatting 
Anyone that wants to improve performance, prevent injury or rehabilitate an old knee injury 
Both men and women 


Sleeves Functionality
- INCREASE PERFORMANCE: Whether you're an elite athlete or a novice, these sleeves help you to perform at the top of your ability 
- AVOID INJURY: By adding support to our body's weaker joints we can avoid unnecessary injury and pain 
- SPEED UP RECOVERY: The compression helps relieve muscle and joint pain as well as aids in muscle recovery & rehabilitation 
- WARMING EFFECT: The sleeves efficiently reduce stiff muscles and joints by retaining heat, which in turn reduces risk of injury 
- Use for all kinds of Workout such as Powerlifting, CrossFit, Gym and other Fitness Activity 


Inside Package
➤ 1 Pair of Knee Sleeves 

Our Guarantee
We are so confident in our Nordic Lifting weight lifting accessories that we offer a 1 Year Manufacturer's Warranty

Click the ADD TO CART Button at the Top of this Page to Protect Your Knees NOW!
feature_bullets: Knee Sleeves Taking Your Performance to the Next Level - by Premium Weightlifting Brand Nordic Lifting
Provides the Best Support for Both Men & Women - Please Check Listing Images for Sizing Chart
Compression is Proven to Promote Muscle Recovery & Injury Prevention
Perfect for Weight Lifting, Cross Training, Powerlifting, Gym and Other Heavy Fitness Workouts
1 Pair of Knee Sleeves - With 1 Year Free No-Hassle Replacement Guarantee

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
